parameters.name: IsHistory
parameters.description: The time when the O\&M task was created. The time in UTC is displayed in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Specify a value greater than **10**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the O\&M task.
